nodes.text: A drum was an instrument that was played with other musicians in a band to create music.
Members of the Max Rebo Band, Ak-rev and Umpass-stay, played large tan hide drums in Jabba's Palace around 4 ABY.
After the Rebel Alliance and Ewoks of Bright Tree Village defeated the Empire's ground forces at the Battle of Endor, some of the Ewoks fashioned a drum set from the helmets of Imperial troops.
